channel.title: Eclipse 639 - [DEVELOPMENT]
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hey everyone, Eclipse 639 has been around for a few months now on and off, Our previous projects have died from lack of funding and Developmental Help. But over the past few weeks I have taken the steps to begin on our path towards becoming the [b]Ultimate 639[/b]. [img]http://eclipse639.com/images/ambient_lighting/misc/images/logo.png[/img]
At the moment I am the Only developer working on Eclipse 639. As you can Imagine it's a big work load to Manage 2 servers by yourself. So I do have open Positions on my Development Staff Team, But Only applicants with A reasonable amount of Knowledge of the 639 Revisions Innerworkings will be considered.
[u][b]Available Positions:[/b][/u] Lead Content Developer - 1/2 Quest Developer - 0/2 Website Development Team - 2/3
Application Format: [code]Position Applying For? - Have you ever Coded/Owned a Server? If so, Can you provide some Snippets or Pictures of your work? - Latest Revision Worked On - MSN - Skype - Year(s) Experience in Private Servers - Availability - TimeZone -[/code]
[COLOR=Red][u][b]We are now Running 2 Worlds![/b][/u][/COLOR] World 1 consists of PvP/Bossing/Master, No training is necessary, This world is more for players who like to just Pk and Boss ================================================================================= World 2, However, Is a Skilling/Training Server. You can still spawn with a few exceptions of certain Items. There is also a 100% Point Shop, Just talk to the rewards trader at home!
[u][b]Eclipse 639 VPS/Dedi Speeds[/b][/u] World 1: [img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1665894778.png[/img]
World 2: [img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1665891308.png[/img]
[B]There are many things that make this server Unique. Take a peek at the Pictures and Features Listed below to check out some Cool stuff we have that others don't :)
[size=10pt]Summoning In Game[/size] [img]http://eclipse639.com/summoning.png[/img]
Items such as Chaotics, Zaros Armour, Spirit Shields, And Godswords Are expensive to spawn, As they are Valuable Pieces of Weaponry/Armour
Nex uses all 3 attack styles and hits through prayer.
[COLOR=purple]Some interesting features: Nex uses all 3 attack styles and hits through prayer. Bossing for valuable Weapons/Armour/Items Economy/PvP Spawn Server Stable VPS! Daily Updates Active Staff VBulletin Forums![/COLOR]
[u][b]Minigames:[/b][/u] Soulwars - 35% Pest Control Duel Arena -100% Castle Wars - 100% Clan Wars - 50%
[u][b]Bosses:[/b][/u] Frost Dragons General Graardor Commander Zilyana Kree' Arra Kril Tsustaroth Nex Barrows Brothers Ice Strykewyrms Chaos Elemental Jad Tormented Demons
=================================================================================
More Coming Soon...
And Now... Time for some Pics!
[img]http://eclipse639.com/pics/w2home.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/pics/deeppk.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/pics/icestrykes.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/pics/safepk.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/pics/slay.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/pics/token.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nex3.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nex2.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nex4.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nex.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/pk2.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/pk.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/skele.png[/img]
[/B][/CENTER]

item.title: Eclipse 639 - [DEVELOPMENT]
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

Position Applying For? - Lead content developer or quest developer, whichever you need more

Have you ever Coded/Owned a Server? If so, Can you provide some Snippets or Pictures of your work? - I can’t but I have had many projects, mainly offline ones which have never made it to be hosted. I mainly used them to experiment. I have also co-owned and coded many servers alongside a team of people such as Deltascape, Oblivion PK etc… Mainly alongside my buddy Sanity (Dexter) creator of the over-used PI lol…

Latest Revision Worked On -508, an offline project I have been working on

MSN - rockyrocks_2@hotmail.co.uk

Skype - j__a__y1

Year(s) Experience in Private Servers -Roughly 5 or 6, I’ve been in this community for a looooong time and played almost every top server there has been since 2005-2006

Availability - I’m a nerd. Need I say more?

TimeZone - GMT

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

First of all, who are the other 2 website developers? I don’t see the applications here… But here’s mine.

Position Applying For? - Website Developer
Have you ever Coded/Owned a Server? If so, Can you provide some Snippets or Pictures of your work? - I have coded multiple websites some of which I can show you if you need examples.
Latest Revision Worked On - A porn site for fun, I’ll give the link to you if you need it as an example.
MSN - Illesc96@gmail.com
Skype - PM me for it
Year(s) Experience in Private Servers - A couple years in private servers, and about 4 years of HTML and 1 of CSS. Also know some PHP.
Availability - 2-5 hours a day.
TimeZone - East Coast USA (EST)

Skype - None
Year(s) Experience in Private Servers - 1 and a something quarter
Availability - 3:30pm through 12:00am on weekdays
TimeZone - I’m in Texas idk the timezone unless it’s called central
Other - I’ve seen some work of yours, not really that interested, but I’m always solo and need a team. If you can make a QuestHandler I would love to do the quests for you

Btw your sig is wrong 4000mb = 4GB 1000mb = 1GB
Your sig was just bothering me
Here is proof
